message.body: Heya. Still on for tonight?
Yep. Hoping to be done here at half past. Would you rather meet closer to your neighborhood?
I'm actually hangin at my studio as long as that's ok with you! If you need me to I can come back to my place tho
Thanks again for coming last night! The girl I was supposed to see today had to change to Thursday, so I will give you a call by Thursday night at the latest.
No worries, lady. Do your thing :)
We can also come to you if that makes it easier, I'm sure yr super busy right now
Yr place totally works. Still 5?
If that's good for you! Thanks!
Im running a few minutes late. At callowhill and 11th now
No prob!
Super excited and officially on board!
What's yr email address?
Thx!
Would 4 or 5 work for photos?
Sure. Would u like me to wear a leotard in this colors or regular clothes? I can pose in either attire
Can you bring both? Thanks!
Ok, let's do 4. Thx!
Ill be there a little after
No prob
Heya! My flight got delayed a bit, I just landed at phl. Can we push back to 6:45? Thanks!
Are we still meeting at 7??
Yup, if that's ok with you?
Yep. I'll head over now
K!
Here!
Where?!?
Sorry, will have to do 7-9 after all on Thursday! Hope that's ok!
No pro
Problem**
Thx!
Just want to give you a heads up, hurt my arm last night, so ill have to take it easy tomorrow on silk. I can still do most stuff and chat choreography,
just with some limitations
Yikes, no worries. Hope you feel better! If you need to reschedule tomorrow let me know
Yikes, running super late, my client got home much later than expected. I will be there by 7:30. Super sorry.
No worries.
Left my planner chez moi today, am i meeting you 7:15??
Cool!
Kate just told me there is a free pool party near here if you wanna go after rehearsal!
Bummmer- that sounds awesome, but im rather under the weather
Here!
Would Friday or Saturday work for us to meet at torrent?
I have two different times in my planner- when do you want me for practice?
1! Sorry bout confusion!
No worries. Im en route. Will be a few minutes late
Here!!
Here!
Whats kates number?
And bring jumper tonight!
I cant meet at 6. I messaged kate but havent heard from her
K, no probs
Jumper! And yr meeting mindy early right? I may need to keep you until 11 if that's ok.
Hey can you send Jeremy a bio? He needs to finish the program. Upholstered.music@gmail.thx!!
I know this is silly... but i have no theatre background so i dont know what to put in a bio...
Will you tell me what info is relevant or send me an example of what yr looking for?
No probs! Just look at others on the website (http://www.iminami.weebly.com). It can really be whatever, don't stress about it.

"Mary wood has performed as an aerialist for two years, in festivals around the country and south Africa. She is stoked to make her theatrical debut with puppetyranny. Many thanks to Kennedy who is a goddess and the best director ever. Smooches to my 6ft
If yr doing anything upcoming you can plug it ("you can check her out putting her feet on her head on a bed of nails at the totally awesome fest in November ")
No prob! Thanks for tolerating my theatre neurosis!
Yr still coming early to rig right? I had to run back to tranny so just let me know when yr on yr way and I'll head back
Leaving now
K, thx!
Im stuck at work. Will get there asap
Any idea on time?
En route
Im running a few minutes behind
How late can i go to greensaw for rigging?
Whenever! I'll be there late so just tell me when you wanna come!
Cool, im at Madeleine's mercy, but will let you know asap
Fantastique. Thx!

Wanna do fire stuff on Saturday? I'm going to include you on a msg to Gary Reuben who owns the place, he said depending on what yr planning they could maybe put you inside. No room for a silk but he said he could rig something else for you if you wanted!
For what? And what time?
At the fringe bar, whatever you wanted to do (Mindy still wants to get in costume and hand out cards too). Later, like 11:30 ish maybe
Awesome. For sure
Sweet. He just wanted to know if you were spinning/spitting/how far I think. I left his email at home so I'll send it out by 4
Sounds good!
Did you get in touch with Gary?
About to. Just got out of work

Sweet. Lemme know what he says! Angela, kate, mindy, and I are seeing a show at 11, so we should get there around 1. J will let me know if he's coming by 5, but if he can't make it do you want his ticket? Naked lady clown show.
Bang right?
Yup!
Yeah, let me know when you can bc i was going to buy for myself and some friends
Ok j can't come so I have one ticket if you want it
Yep!
Sweet, see ya there!
I spoke to gary briefly but hes going to talk to his partner and call back
K
How do i get the ticket?
I'll be there in a minute and give to ya
Coool
Ill be about 10 minutes late
Thx
You're not being chased by a maniac again right?
Nope. All clear.
What is it saying????
I'll be a bit late, probably see you in an hour
K, thx!
When do festivities commence?
We are headed there now!
Cool, need any snacks, breads, beverages, etc?
I think we're ok!
But everyone always loves snacks
Iminami movie night! Are you free this Sunday eve? Will try to find a time that works for all.
Im in Miami this weekend :(
Cool, everyone seems busy so we're pushing it back to next week. Have fun!
You comin tonight?
Stuck at work. Depends when i can get free
We have tons of beer and alcohol and will all cry if you don't come
I will try!
Where yall at? Is it worth coming?
So what's yr plan tonight?
If your available mask at 4 or 5, and aerial at 8
Ok, yea 5 for mask sounds good. You wanna come to trans? Or do you have materials?
Trans sounds good.see you at 5!
K!
Ill ne there about quarter after!
Cool, me too
You can come over whenever!
Hey lady! I need to get that glue gun back. You around at all this week/today?
Tonight! Ill bring it to you!
Sweet! In a noisy place, can't pick up right now. What time?
Later tonight. When works for you?
I'm at trans till 7:30, then home after that!
I got my car back from my bf too late last night, but I can deliver it today after I teach. 9:30ish?
Sure! I'll be at home if that's not a problem. I found my other one so it's not that big a deal actually if you need a better time!
Id rather return it sooner than later, plus I could bring a couple beers if you want to chat for a few :)
Yessss let's do please!
